Name: Blast Radius [X/Y]
Description: This weapon explodes, dealing no critical damage. Roll double damage dice within X meters, none beyond Y meters. If X is 0, only the tile it lands on receives double damage.

Name: Bulky
Description: Disadvantage and -2 penalty to stealth checks.

Name: Chain
Description: This chain weapon can get around an opponent's defense. The target gains no Guard from carrying a shield or second weapon, but you take a -2 attack penalty.

Name: Cover
Description: The Guard bonus on this item applies to ranged attacks as well.

Name: Double Grip [X]
Description: When you have nothing in the offhand, increase the damage by X when attacking.

Name: Durability [X]
Description: This item can take X damage before it breaks.

Name: Finesse
Description: You may use your AGI modifier instead of your MGT modifier for the attack and damage rolls.

Name: Flimsy
Description: This weapon gets a -2 penalty to attack rolls in melee and breaks on hit.

Name: Light
Description: This weapon is ideal for use in the off-hand while dual-wielding, and can be used while grappling.

Name: Range [X]
Description: For every X meters the target is away, take -2 to your attack roll.

Name: Reach
Description: Add 2 meters to your attack range. When enemies enter your weapon range and none are already next to you, make an AoO. If it succeeds they are pushed back.

Name: Split
Description: This weapon can use the Split Shield technique.

Name: Stun
Description: You strike with a blunt end of the weapon. Perform your Swing attack, but halve the damage done and convert it to Crushing.

Name: Sunder [X/Y]
Description: This weapon ignores X of Y damage reduction.

Name: Sweep
Description: This weapon can use the Sweep technique.

Name: Thrown [X]
Description: This weapon has no extra throwing penalty. For every X meters the target is away, take -2 to your attack roll. Y is the maximum distance it can be thrown.
